column3: utACK bc308ba999ec86d8ebc32f8845069c07cb43cf8d with my rationale copied from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10267#issuecomment-375775708\n\nI am fine with bumping to 40 or 50 minutes. In case we need that much time, it will time out due to the global limit anyway. The long term solution would be to somehow speed up the unit tests on Wine, but that doesn't have to block this (and other)

The windows build still seems to be timing out, examples:

https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/363172751#L2758
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/363172751#L2758
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/361968560#L2747
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/361810096#L2747

Maybe it would be a good idea to temporarily disable these checks.
